name: Cash-in-Transit Van Simulator
description:
Now, get ready for a different experience of driving bank cash security van to transfer bank cash & currency from ATM to ATM or bank to bank. Be alert of Gangsters & Robbers and transfer money safely in this driving simulator. Race to the destination & fill ATM machines with cash. Do not break laws or bump your ride into other buses or vehicles.

For ultimate adventure accept the challenges and start your van with metallic bullet proof body and armed security force to deliver the cash. Drive the van without fear while transporting Currency notes. So be with us on a crazy journey most thrilling and exciting game ever of cash delivery. Gangsters plan a grand robbery & escape so be alert & transfer money safely to destination. Race to the destination & escape as a super hero in crime chase mission.

Buckle your seat belt, hold your steering, and let your crazy wheels moving in this ultimate transportation game.

City Bank Cash-in-Transit Van Simulator Features:
• Awesome van driving challenge missions
• Realistic 3D city environment
• Cash delivery driving adventure
• Engaging background music
• Smooth controls for driving
• Thrilling and realistic missions
• Fun & Easy to play
